text: Marty Wilde, (born Reginald Leonard Smith; 15 April 1939) is an English rock pop singer-songwriter. He is the father of pop singers Ricky, Kim and Roxanne Wilde. Wilde was born in London. His career began in 1957. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Marty Wilde website (with discography) * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:English pop singers Category:English rock singers Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Singer-songwriters from London
title: Marty Wilde
